thread.title: Lauren Goodger shares bizarre theory Cheryl FAKED her pregnancy
thread.title_full: Lauren Goodger shares bizarre theory Cheryl FAKED her pregnancy

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Lauren Goodger shares bizarre theory Cheryl FAKED her pregnancy
text:
Lauren Goodger shares bizarre theory Cheryl FAKED her pregnancy The TOWIE star has questioned why Cheryl has been "hiding away" Share   
Millions of One Direction fans around the globe are waiting with bated breath for the news that Cheryl has given birth to Liam Payne's baby – but there's one person who wasn't sure it was ever going to happen. 
And now Lauren Goodger has revealed that she thought Cheryl's pregnancy wasn't all it seemed – and admitted she suspected it might have been fake. 
"It's so strange that Cheryl has been so secretive about her pregnancy," she told Closer magazine. 
"I've questioned whether it's even real. I'm not sure why she's hiding away." Cheryl has kept her pregnancy mostly to herself (Photo: A J Odudu/Youtube) But Lauren can't understand why Cheryl has "hidden away" (Photo: Instagram/laurenrosegoodger) 
In contrast, the 30-year-old reality star said that when she falls pregnant, she'll make sure she makes the most of it for nine whole months. 
"I'll definitely pose naked when I'm pregnant – I'll be so proud and they're pictures I'll want to keep for the rest of my life," she added. 
Lauren, who's dating criminal Joey Morrison despite him currently being locked up for a string of crimes, later clarified her bizarre fake pregnancy theory and said she meant to harm towards Cheryl or Liam. Lauren wants to pose naked when she falls pregnant (Photo: Instagram/laurenrosegoodger) Lauren's boyfriend Joseph 'Joey' Morrison (Photo: Internet Unknown) 
"I'm a fan of Cheryl and Liam and very happy for them both , they make a beautiful couple I haven't read it but wasn't meant in bad way," she tweeted. 
It comes as Lauren admitted that she and Joey still haven't had sex - but they're planning to do it as soon as Joey's allowed to go on day release from jail. 
A previous day release saw the lovebirds strolling around Joey's prison grounds and taking selfies, but a 'petty incident' in jail meant his privileges were suspended. Like us on Facebook
